solution_line_template: First find how much Jed was above the speed limit: ${total_fine} fine / ${fine_per_mph_over} for each mile per hour over = <<{total_fine}/{fine_per_mph_over}={mph_over_limit}>>{mph_over_limit} miles per hour over.
Since the speed limit is {posted_speed_limit} mph, this means Jed was driving {posted_speed_limit} + {mph_over_limit} = <<{posted_speed_limit}+{mph_over_limit}={jed_speed}>>{jed_speed} mph.
